title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 826.0 - Introductory
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 826.0 - Introductory

State Regulations
(a) All tariffs
filed on or after the effective date of this Part [April 1, 1974], unless
otherwise authorized by special permission of the commissioner, must conform
with this Part, except that local tariffs consisting of not more than four
pages (including the title page) of carriers regularly operating not more than
five trucks may be published under the provisions of Part 825 of this Title. The commissioner may direct the reissue of any tariff, power of attorney or
concurrence at any time. (b) This

Part contains no rules with respect to suspension of tariff provisions or
transfer of operations. Procedure in such instances will be outlined in the
commissioner's orders relating thereto. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
826.0

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
